thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com
thread.title: Amanda Batstone
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Amanda Batstone

author: Amanda Batstone
title: Amanda Batstone
text: Skipper made my entire hotel search so much easier! They handled everything for me and did all the behind the scenes communications with the hotel so I didn't need to! And they helped keep me organized so that I could cross off another item on my wedding to-do list relatively quickly. Thank you!!
